settings.description: Total number of Bitcoin transactions in the database

reports.title: 24h Transaction Volume
reports.query: MATCH (tx:Transaction) WHERE tx.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P1D') RETURN sum(tx.value) as Volume

settings.description: Total Bitcoin volume in the last 24 hours

reports.title: Transaction Volume Over Time
reports.query: MATCH (tx:Transaction) WHERE tx.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P30D') WITH date(tx.timestamp) as day, sum(tx.value) as volume RETURN day, volume ORDER BY day

settings.description: Bitcoin transaction volume over the last 30 days

reports.title: Largest Transactions
reports.query: MATCH (tx:Transaction) WHERE tx.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P7D') RETURN tx.hash as TxHash, tx.value as Value, tx.timestamp as Timestamp ORDER BY Value DESC LIMIT 10

settings.description: Largest Bitcoin transactions in the last 7 days

reports.title: Transaction Network
reports.query: MATCH (a:Address)-[:PARTICIPATES_IN]->(tx:Transaction)<-[:PARTICIPATES_IN]-(b:Address) WHERE tx.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P1D') RETURN a, tx, b LIMIT 100

reports.title: Top Addresses by Balance
reports.query: MATCH (addr:Address) RETURN addr.address as Address, addr.balance as Balance ORDER BY Balance DESC LIMIT 15

settings.description: Addresses with the highest Bitcoin balances

reports.title: Address Activity Distribution
reports.query: MATCH (addr:Address)-[:PARTICIPATES_IN]->(tx:Transaction) WITH addr, count(tx) as txCount RETURN CASE WHEN txCount < 10 THEN '1-9' WHEN txCount < 100 THEN '10-99' WHEN txCount < 1000 THEN '100-999' ELSE '1000+' END as ActivityLevel, count(addr) as AddressCount ORDER BY ActivityLevel

settings.description: Distribution of addresses by transaction count

reports.title: Address Connections
reports.query: MATCH (a:Address)-[:PARTICIPATES_IN]->(:Transaction)<-[:PARTICIPATES_IN]-(b:Address) WHERE a.balance > 10 AND b.balance > 10 RETURN a, b LIMIT 200

reports.title: Sanctioned Addresses by Category
reports.query: MATCH (addr:Address) WHERE addr.sanctioned = true RETURN addr.category as Category, count(addr) as AddressCount ORDER BY AddressCount DESC

settings.description: Distribution of sanctioned addresses by category

reports.title: Recently Active Sanctioned Addresses
reports.query: MATCH (addr:Address)-[:PARTICIPATES_IN]->(tx:Transaction) WHERE addr.sanctioned = true AND tx.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P7D') RETURN addr.address as Address, addr.entity as Entity, addr.category as Category, max(tx.timestamp) as LastActivity ORDER BY LastActivity DESC LIMIT 10

settings.description: Sanctioned addresses with activity in the last 7 days

reports.title: High-Value Transactions to Sanctioned Addresses
reports.query: MATCH (addr:Address)-[r:PARTICIPATES_IN]->(tx:Transaction) WHERE addr.sanctioned = true AND r.type = 'INPUT' AND tx.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P30D') RETURN tx.hash as TxHash, tx.value as Value, addr.address as SanctionedAddress, addr.entity as Entity, tx.timestamp as Timestamp ORDER BY Value DESC LIMIT 15

settings.description: Largest transactions to sanctioned addresses in the last 30 days
